step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm extended overhead. Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
Excellent! You're opening your palm and fingers wide. This is a key part of the exercise.
Great work making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Remember to breathe deeply.
Well done opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
Second rep, starting strong! Keep that arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Nice wide open hand and fingers. You're doing great with this step.
You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale. Keep up the good work.
Fantastic! You're exhaling and relaxing your hand. You've completed both reps with good form.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. You consistently opened your hand wide and made a good fist while breathing. Keep up the excellent work promoting lymph flow!
